about1: WorkWave is an online platform for accurate and fast job search and personnel selection, services that can be used by all labor market participants. The project provides users with convenient access to a database of vacancies and resumes.
about2: The project was founded in 2008 and is currently one of the largest employment resources in the Azerbaijani market.
about3: WorkWave is not an employment company and provides  direct and prompt contact between employer and applicant.
about4: WorkWave gives users the ability to self-direct posting vacancies and resumes. Every user can free Post one vacancy and/or one resume per month on the site.
about5: We make every effort to continuously improve and development of the project and are grateful for the feedback that contributes to this. We will be glad to receive them by email -
advertising1: WorkWave is one of the most popular and steadily growing Internet resources of Azerbaijan, which is visited daily by thousands Human.
advertising2: Advertising on WorkWave is one of the best ways to communicate your brands, products, services, promotions and significant events are very large audience!
advertising3: You will achieve both a serious increase in your brand awareness, and wide dissemination of information about your products, and also get an excellent opportunity to increase your traffic to the Internet sites of your companies and organizations.
advertising4: We will be glad to cooperate with you!
login_help: Forgot your password? Write the email you entered during registration and username. A password will be sent to your email shortly!
